text: The 2016 ATP Shenzhen Open was a professional men's tennis tournament played on hard courts. It was the third edition of the tournament, and part of the ATP World Tour 250 series of the 2016 ATP World Tour. It took place at the Shenzhen Longgang Tennis Centre in Shenzhen, China from September 26 to October 2. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! style="width:70px;"| Country ! style="width:175px;"| Player ! Rank1 !
